meanings.sent1: The insigne on his uniform showed his rank.
meanings.sent2: The company logo is an insigne that represents their brand.
meanings.sent3: The cat wore an insigne on its collar to show it belonged to the royal family.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an insigne of happiness that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse served as an insigne guiding ships safely to shore.

meanings.sent1: She proudly displayed her school insigne on her backpack.

meanings.sent4: The ancient sword was marked with an insigne of a dragon.
meanings.sent5: The family crest was an insigne passed down through generations.

meanings.sent1: The general received a prestigious insigne for his bravery in battle.
meanings.sent2: The soldier proudly wore his insigne on his uniform.
